price: Kur Zoti yt u tha engjëjve: “Unë do të krijoj një njeri prej balte.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla rabbuka lil'malāikati innī khāliqun basharan min ṭīnin
